result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffery B. Wendt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Intimidate Victim/Dissuade Complaints [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.44(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk Chereec
Cases 15CF334, 15CM704 and 15CM994 called: 10:50am
State appears by ADA M.Puerner.  Def appears in person/in custody and with Atty Toulouse.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW** 

State moves for leave of COURT to file Amended Information in 15CF334 -- COURT grants and accepts Amended Information
State moves to:
15CF334 - Ct. 1 (Battery-DA Repeater/DA/DA Repeater/Repeater)>>AMEND to Misd Battery/DA/Repeater
15CF334 - Ct. 2 (DC-DA Repeater/DA/DA Repeater/Repeater)>>AMEND to DC/DA/Repeater
15CM994>>D&RI entire file
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
15CF334 - Ct. 1 (Misd Battery/DA/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST
15CF334 - Ct. 2 (DC/DA/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST
15CM704 - Ct. 1 (Intimidate Victim/Repeater)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF334 - Ct. 1>> 2 years TOTAL: 18 months incarceration and 6 months ES
15CF334 - Ct. 2>> 2 years TOTAL: 1 year incarceration and 1 year ES, concurrent to Ct. 1
15CM704 - Ct. 1>> 2 years TOTAL: 18 months incarceration and 6 months ES, CONSECUTIVE to Ct. 1 in 15CF334
CONDITIONS of ES>>Completion of SAFE program or its equivalent; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C w/victim A.B. unless as approved by PO; DNA sample; CC including DNA surcharge in each count, and 2 D.A. surcharges in 15CF334 counts

>>CREDIT For time served in 15CF334 on each count of 140 days
>>CREDIT for time served in 15CM704 of 134 days
>>Defendant IS NOT eligible for either CIP or SAP in any case

COURT remands defendant to WI State Prison System.

Adj: 11:06am
STC set

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement - states prison is not appropriate sentence.

State WITHDRAWS Amended Information -- COURT vacates Amended Information and original information filed 4/15/15 remains charging document.
ALL PLEAS ARE VACATED AND DISMISSAL IS VACATED IN 15CM994, AND NOT GUILTY PLEAS REINSTATED
